1.content:
It’s mid afternoon and you’re just putting the finishing touches to getting ready for your blind-date. “Right… wallet, keys, cash. Anything else?” you mutter to yourself as you pick up the necessities. You don’t want to carry too much. It might be liable to rain later, but it‘s hit and miss and you don’t want to wind up being too hot. “The card!” you remind yourself as you grab the A6 card, which has the all important address on it.

Deciding you’ve got everything, you head out of the front door, and to your car. It’s only a Rover Vittesse, but you keep it clean, so it’s presentable – and it’s pretty quick. Double-checking the address, you head off to…
1.title: Here goes.

11.content:
Your date’s house to pick her up. It’s a surprisingly long drive, but you enjoy it anyways; listening to some music… and that Rover V8 that never fails to put a smile on your lips. When you arrive, you simply cannot believe your eyes. The place is huge.

No mansion per-se, but simply huge. The door alone must stand a clear hundred feet tall. Realising you’d driven right to the door, you park your car beside some huge glass structure (milk bottle perhaps?), and knock on the door as hard as you can (you figure it best given the size).

After a few moments, the door opens. All of it. “Hello?” comes a huge, yet clearly feminine voice from way above.

“H... Hell… o?” you respond instinctively as you look up to where the voice came from.

Okay, quick option… female or herm? Or something else? Or maybe you wanna write your own version of this bit?
11.title: the biggest little house ever

1511.content:
"Keys I gotta remember my keys...." you said to yourself as your getting ready to leave for your date tonight. While also thinking about just how lucky you are. I mean just couple of months ago you had acquired a new job at a grocery store that actually doesn't pay to bad. And with only a few months of work it has already come with a huge perk. With you being a big baseball fan and all, you found out that your manager gets free tickets due to some settlement with her divorce. And she asked you if you wanted a pair of tickets to go see your favorite baseball team play the Blue Jay's. With only one added condition, you had to do it as a date with her friend that she said was really cute.

Since she knew that you were single and loved baseball, she already figured that you were going to say yes. In which you did with no thought other then you get to go see your favorite baseball team play live. You begin your drive the stadium. With ease your able to get a parking spot with the premium spots that you were also given. Your surprised at how empty the stadium is but figured that on a Tuesday game the crowds must be small due to work. So as you pass by the convection stands. Looking at the workers who seem very bored.

You start walking up a hallway that leads to the seats. With patches of crowd members spread out across the bleachers. You find your seat with ease. It really seems like everyone is minding there own business and lost in there own worlds to notice much of anything as they wait for the game to start. You knew to arrive early to get everything ready like food and such. While you wait for your date to show up in like 5 mins. But you become surprised as you are in an instant hit in the head with something....

As you begin to wake your greeted with a gigantic sneaker in front of you. Scared you start Looking up to you see everything is giant and the owner of the sneaker is...
1511.title: baseball

155131.content:
...the Sadie Hawkins dance. Getting into your car you put on some music and type the directions to your dates house into your phone. Backing out and your on your way. While driving you begin to think about how strange this whole situation was. I mean you were pretty much in desperate mode two days ago when you found out that all your friends were asked to the dance by girls and you weren't asked by anyone. *Flashback* ...

So with the dance almost two days away you were starting to get to the point of thinking up an excuse to not look to lame for not going. You knew that if this dance wasn't a Sadie Hawkins theme you would find a date no problem, but given the fact that it was and most of the girls at your school either seemed to uninterested in going or nervous to ask someone you were put into a bind here.

That was in till you desperately opened up your locker that day and found a note, Reading "I wanted to know if you would go to the dance with me, Check yes or no... (then going to the back of the note) Please put into locker 133 after you have checked a box". You were all excited in till you read the number of the girls locker.

(You see at this high school there are four different parts split up by freshmen, sophomore, junior, and senior. With the lockers for each class year also being separated into there respected places and each freshmen would get a 1 in front of there locker number, sophomore a 2, etc.. to you a senior with locker 403).

In your head --> 133... she's a freshmen. You know your going to get a ton of ridicule if you show up with some freshmen. But then again you didn't want to miss out on hanging out that night and you are desperate to say that a girl ask you to the dance. So you checked yes very quickly. And made your way over to the freshmen sector. With it being your study break and freshmen having class time. This was your best chance to sneak in and then sneak out very quickly. Which is what you did successfully.

*End Flashback* Ending your line of thought, you began to feel so dumb. Not because of what your doing or did. But more so the fact that you didn't even think about what she could look like. You were in such a desperate state of mind. That you didn't even consider what the girl looked like. But it's to late now. So you just kept driving with hopes that she is some cute younger girl who is into seniors.

As you begin to get closer though you see on your G. maps that up ahead there was going to be traffic. So knowing that would cause you to be like an hour late. you decided to get off at the closet exit and see if you could find a way over to your date's house. But as soon as you get off at the exit and drive a few feet, your g. maps seems to malfunction for a sec as a storm starts pouring rain. "Stupid machine... doesn't work at all in the rain..." you said out loud in anger. But with a flash of lightning, the storm ended and your g. map tells you that you have to make a turn and your at your destination. In which you do and see...
155131.title: On the way trouble...

info.brief_description: You go on a blind date, which turns out to be a BIG date. Giant infact.
info.description:
You start out at the begining of your date - be it meeting at a specified location, or ariving to pick them up. It might have been set up by a friend or yourself, be via an agency or someone you know.

The date may be human or furry or a mythological humanoid (fairy, elf, alien (if so, nothing too weird).
As stated, the date can also be either female or herm (female but with a cock/cock&balls too) - as with the way the date starts, you don't have to be aware of even the existence of either macro/giant beings or of herms.

content-wise, I'd like to ask that death and destruction be kept to a minimum please, though dependig on how it's writen etc... I will allow some. Also, I'd prefer no scat. if you must have this, put a warning beforehand. Age-wise, your character is generally however old you are, but feel free to add more specific options. Other characters can be any age. It's fiction after all.

whenever you ad a chapted, be sure to include an "other" option or similar. this way, if someone wants to put a diferent take on something, they can.

try to keep an eye on spelling and grammar please. there's a spell check on here, and on most WPs. I'll not go loopy over the odd finger-slip etc... but do make an effort. This may be porn, but it should still be readable.

Perspective can be interchanged; just don't make it confusing

lastly, no one-sentence chapters unless its for covering options to lead to the actual chapter - If i'm making sense there. Any chapters I feel are sub-par or are too much on the violence/grossness, I'll pm you and ask you to tone it down. I'm also possibly liable to correct spellings.

so... anything else...? seems to be it... well, this is my first story on here; lets make it a good one eh? lots of options, but try not to have a story listing 30 chapters in which all of them are just follow-on options.

Have fun writing/reading.

Gift-Points for new chapters (the better the chapter, the more points)
